md.name: descriptive
md.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"><dc:title xsi:type="dcterms:cs">Diagnostika poruch řeči u osob s Parkinsonovou nemocí</dc:title><dcterms:translated xsi:type="dcterms:en">Diagnosis of impaired communication ability of patients suffering from Parkinson's disease</dcterms:translated><dcterms:alternative></dcterms:alternative><dcterms:alternativeTranslated></dcterms:alternativeTranslated><dc:studyID>prezenční</dc:studyID><dc:creator>Šimonková, Ivona</dc:creator><dcterms:dateofbirth></dcterms:dateofbirth><dc:subject>Parkinsonova nemoc</dc:subject><dc:description xsi:type="dcterms:cs">Diplomová práce se zaměřuje na diagnostický proces narušené komunikační schopnosti u osob s Parkinsonovou nemocí. V teoretické části je připraven přehled dosavadních poznatků o problematice Parkinsonovy nemoci, řečových potížích spojených s PN a možnostech logopedické diagnostiky. V praktické části je posuzován řečový projev osob s PN. Dysartrické poruchy řeči jsou hodnoceny v závislosti na délce trvání PN. Pro zkoumání vzorku osob s PN je zvolen tzv. Test 3F, který se používá pro diagnostikování osob postižených dysartrií. Pro účely posouzení jsou osoby s Parkinsonovou nemocí rozčleněny do skupin dle délky trvání jejich nemoci.</dc:description><dc:publisher>Univerzita Karlova v Praze</dc:publisher><dcterms:advisor>Housarová, Blanka</dcterms:advisor><dcterms:referee></dcterms:referee><dcterms:created xsi:type="dcterms:W3CDTF">2006-04-10</dcterms:created><dcterms:dateAccepted></dcterms:dateAccepted><dc:status></dc:status><dc:type>diplomová práce</dc:type><dc:format xsi:type="dcterms:IMT">application.pdf</dc:format><dc:identifier></dc:identifier><dc:language xsi:type="dcterms:ISO 639-1">cs</dc:language><dc:rights></dc:rights><dcterms:name>Mgr.</dcterms:name><dcterms:level></dcterms:level><dcterms:discipline></dcterms:discipline><dcterms:grantor>Univerzita Karlova v Praze. Pedagogická fakulta. Katedra speciální pedagogiky</dcterms:grantor><dc:collection>dp</dc:collection><dc:collection></dc:collection><dc:subject xsi:type="">Parkinson's disease</dc:subject><dc:subject>dysarthria</dc:subject><dc:subject>diagnosis</dc:subject><dc:subject>test 3F</dc:subject><dc:subject>dysartrie</dc:subject><dc:subject>diagnostika</dc:subject><dc:subject>test 3F</dc:subject><dc:description xsi:type="dcterms:en">The thesis deals with the diagnosis of impaired communication ability of patients suffering from Parkinson's disease. The theoretical part surveys the up to now knowledge of Parkinson's disease, speech problems connected with Parkinson's disease and specific possibilities of logopaedic diagnosis. In the practical part the speech of people suffering from Parkinson's disease is assessed. Dysarthric speech impairments are assessed in relation to the length of Parkinson's disease. Test 3F (used for diagnosing dysarthric patients) is used to examine a group of people suffering from Parkinson's disease. The people are divided into three groups according to the length of their disease.</dc:description></record>
